text: The 1917–18 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team represented Drexel Institute of Art, Science and Industry during the 1916–17 men's basketball season. The Blue and Gold played their home games at Main Building. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style="background:#F8B800; color:#002663;"| Regular season |- ==References== Category:Drexel Dragons men's basketball seasons Drexel Category:1917 in sports in Pennsylvania Category:1918 in sports in Pennsylvania
title: 1917–18 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team
